Name: Laboratory
Text: As you enter the room it seems different. This room has seen recent use. A number of pipes and cauldrons are placed on burning coals. A chemistry apparatus next to the door is boiling strange fuilds. This is a laboratory.

Name: Chemistry apparatus
Text: On the main stone table there is an elaborate chemistry apparatus. Various glass pipes dripping along and mixing slowly. What do you do?

Name: Lock box
Text: You notice a small lock box sitting on a table. You rattle it and hear somehting inside. You smash the box open using the stock of your crossow. Inside is a beautifully cut ruby the size of your fist.
